column1: <p></p><p> CARACAS, Venezuela (Reuters) - Venezuela is looking to buyarms to strengthen its military capability and Russian MiG-29fighters are among the options being evaluated, a seniorofficer said on Monday.</p>
column2: <p></p><p> caracas, venezuela (reuters) - venezuela is looking to buyarms to strengthen its military capability and russian mig-29fighters are among the options being evaluated, a seniorofficer said on monday.</p>
